text: 17:12-13 2 Atriviba 24:15-20; 2 Eghaghaniba 36:10-13“Nɨ mangɨ Israelɨn ikɨzir akaba batozimɨn azaragh, me ti akar isɨn zuir kamɨn mɨngarim gɨfos, ti puvatɨ? Akar isɨn zuir kamɨn mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu. Babilonian atrivim, Jerusalemɨn izegha atrivim ko an gumazir dapaniba ua bagha me inigha Babilonɨn ghu.
